definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
(of a woman) to marry/to marry off a daughter/to shift (blame etc)

sentences.english: I will never marry another man if you should die before me.
sentences.chinese: 萬一你比我先死的話，我決不會再嫁給其他的男人。

sentences.english: Her husband died ten years ago but she's since remarried.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫死於十年之前，但從那時起她就再嫁了。

sentences.english: But can't re-marry to my boss as my boss refuse to divorce.
sentences.chinese: 但她不能再嫁給上司是因老闆還珍細他的原配婚姻。

sentences.english: The third part objectively appraises the right of women's remarriage in Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分客觀地評價了宋朝婦女的再嫁權問題。

sentences.english: The first part introduces the phenomenon of women's remarriage in Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分介紹了兩宋婦女再嫁的現象。

sentences.english: Only women that kill their husbands marry again.
sentences.chinese: 只有殺死他們丈夫的女人才會再嫁。

definition: to live as widow/to observe widowhood
(of a woman) to marry/to marry off a daughter/to shift (blame etc)
to remarry (of a widow)/second wife/qin and se 琴瑟[qin2 se4], two string instruments as a symbol of marital harmony
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
to take a wife/to get married (man)
to take a wife/to marry (a woman)
(of a woman) to marry a man of lower social status/to marry down
